mapper.select: SELECT category_no as categoryNo, category_nm as categoryNm, top_no as topNo, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDt, TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') modDt, status FROM category WHERE category_no = #{categoryNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) cnt FROM category WHERE category_no LIKE #{categoryNo} ||'%'

SELECT category_no as categoryNo, LPAD(' ', 3 * (level-1)) || category_nm as categoryNm, top_no as topNo, TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDt, TO_CHAR(mod_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') modDt, status FROM category a START WITH top_no = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR category_no = top_no
mapper.update: UPDATE category SET category_nm = #{categoryNm}, status = #{status}, top_no = #{topNo}, mod_dt = SYSDATE WHERE category_no = #{categoryNo}
